name: glassdoor_bulk_search
description: Search multiple job queries on Glassdoor in parallel using concurrent browser tabs. Use this instead of calling glassdoor_search_jobs multiple times - it is faster and more efficient. Pass all queries as a single comma-separated string. Example: 'software engineer,product manager,data scientist'.

parameters.name: queries
parameters.description: Comma-separated job search queries (e.g. 'software engineer,product manager,data scientist')

detailSteps.code: const jobs = []; const cards = document.querySelectorAll('.jobCard, .react-job-listing, [data-test="jobListing"], li[data-jobid], .JobsList_jobListItem__wjTHv'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(cards.length, 8); i++) { const card = cards[i]; const titleEl = card.querySelector('.job-title, .jobTitle, a[data-test="job-title"], .JobCard_jobTitle__GLyJ1'); const companyEl = card.querySelector('.employer-name, .job-employer, [data-test="employer-name"], .EmployerProfile_compactEmployerName__9MGcV'); const locationEl = card.querySelector('.location, [data-test="emp-location"], .JobCard_location__rCz3x'); const salaryEl = card.querySelector('.salary-estimate, [data-test="detailSalary"], .JobCard_salaryEstimate__QpbTW'); const linkEl = card.querySelector('a[href*="/job-listing/"], a[href*="/partner/"], a.jobTitle, a[data-test="job-title"]'); let url = ''; if (linkEl) { const href = linkEl.getAttribute('href') || ''; url = href.startsWith('http') ? href : 'https://www.glassdoor.com' + href; } jobs.push({ title: titleEl ? titleEl.textContent.trim() : 'Unknown', company: companyEl ? companyEl.textContent.trim() : '', location: locationEl ? locationEl.textContent.trim() : '', salary_estimate: salaryEl ? salaryEl.textContent.trim() : 'Not listed', url: url }); } const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search); return { query: urlParams.get('sc.keyword') || '', job_count: jobs.length, jobs: jobs }
